pullrequest.title: Overload SetupClient() and SetupServer() with std::vector<std::string>

content.raw: When you run gazebo or gzserver, all the options (--version, --server-plugin, etc.) are parsed but when using gazebo as a library, the arguments are only parsed by the system plugins. So, there are no expectations here. You can pass everything you need inside your system plugin. Nobody else is going to read the arguments except your own system plugin.
content.html: When you run gazebo or gzserver, all the options (--version, --server-plugin, etc.) are parsed but when using gazebo as a library, the arguments are only parsed by the system plugins. So, there are no expectations here. You can pass everything you need inside your system plugin. Nobody else is going to read the arguments except your own system plugin.
